casebody.data:
HERNDON
v.
HERNDON. No. 363A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 30, 2015.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of November 2015 by Plaintiff for Additions to Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of November 2015."
